data.comment: The match has started, with Stoke kicking-off.
The away team replace Lee Gregory with Sam Vokes.
In the minute 42, Liam Shaw (Sheffield Wed) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Sheffield Wed have kicked-off the second half at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 46, Tony Pulis (Sheffield Wed) is making a first substitution, with Jordan Rhodes replacing Liam Shaw.
Nathan Collins (Stoke) gets a yellow card.
Kadeem Harris (Sheffield Wed) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 76, Stoke make their second substitution with Jordan Cousins replacing John Mikel Obi.
Jacob Brown is on a sub for James McClean for Stoke.
Jordan Cousins is booked for the away team.
In the minute 81, Tony Pulis is making the team's second substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Moses Odubajo replacing Kadeem Harris.
Isaiah Brown is replacing Jordan Rhodes for the home team.
Massimo Luongo (Sheffield Wed) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
That's full-time at Hillsborough Stadium. The final score is 0-0.
